description: A bottle of flammable liquid with a long fuse inserted ready to be used in a staff sling.  Use this item to light the fuse.  You will, of course, need a lighter or matches in your inventory to do this.  After lighting it, throw it to cause fires.
//: As multiple ammo types are not possible setting these as ammo type rock so they will go in staff sling

description: This is a military-grade fragmentary hand grenade, modified with a retaining fuse for use in a staff sling.  Use this item to snap the fuse and activate the grenade.  You will then have five seconds before it explodes; throwing it would be a good idea.

use_action.msg: You snap the retaining fuse on the grenade.

//: As multiple ammo types are not possible setting these as ammo type rock so they will go in staff sling
